Kākāriki raising chicks near Whangārei https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/kakariki-raise-chicks-near-whangarei/HHCJTMGB35ETVM4CPUPJDNYN54/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/kakariki-raise-chicks-near-whangarei/HHCJTMGB35ETVM4CPUPJDNYN54/ Sarah CurtisBoth parents had been doing 'absolutely brilliantly' in taking care of their brood. Wed, 29 May 2024 04:00:00 +0000 Keen conservationist Ethan Benney spent years predator-proofing a historic piece of bush on his family's Glenbervie farm, near Whangārei. He suspected a pair of rare kākāriki were raising chicks there when he noticed them coming and going from this hole in an old tree trunk. Photo / Michael Cunningham.
